chat.msg: Welcome!
on the top right there is a map
As the navigator, I do not have access to the map. Could you please provide me with the instructions to guide us through the map?
on the bottom left there is chest

Understood. From my current position, I will begin by heading towards the bottom left. 

As I move towards the bottom left, please let me know if there are any specific landmarks or objects that I should be aware of along the way.
next to the chest is a snake

Got it. I have reached the bottom left and I see the chest. Next to the chest, there is a snake. 

Should I proceed in any specific direction from here, or is there anything else you would like me to observe in this area?
go past the snake towards the giraffe

Understood. I will move past the snake and head towards the giraffe. 

As I make my way towards the giraffe, please let me know if there are any other objects or landmarks that I should take note of.
cross the rocks towards the elephant
cross the rocks towards the elephant

Alright. I will cross the rocks and head towards the elephant.

While I'm making my way towards the elephant, please inform me of any other objects or landmarks that I should be aware of on this part of the map.
under the elephant there is a black rock and an alligator next to it

Thank you for the information. I have arrived at the elephant and I can see the black rock underneath it. Next to the black rock, there is an alligator.

What is the next step from here?
go cross the alligator towards the frog

Got it. I will go past the alligator and head towards the frog.

As I proceed towards the frog, please let me know if there are any additional objects or landmarks that I should be aware of.
go under the frog and back again to walk across rocks

Understood. I will go under the frog and then return to walk across the rocks again.

As I navigate back to the rocks, please let me know if there are any specific directions or landmarks I should take note of along the way.
go around the parrot next to the elephant

Understood. I will go around the parrot next to the elephant.

As I navigate around the parrot, please let me know if there are any other objects or landmarks that I should be aware of in this area.
go across a stick and under the tiger

Understood. I will go across the stick and then proceed under the tiger.

As I make my way under the tiger, please let me know if there are any additional objects or landmarks that I should be aware of.
go towards where the tiger is facing the map

Understood. I will go towards the direction where the tiger is facing on the map.

As I move in that direction, please let me know if there are any specific objects or landmarks that I should be aware of.
across the stick there is a map

Thank you for the information. I have crossed the stick and I can see the map.

Is there any specific instruction or action you would like me to take in relation to the map?
read the map

As the navigator, I cannot physically read the map. It's important for the instructor to provide specific instructions or guidance based on the information on the map.

Please let me know the next step based on the map's information or provide any additional instructions you have.
what does the map say

Apologies for the confusion, as the navigator, I do not have access to the exact details on the map. I can only describe the objects and landmarks I see and ask for further instructions based on that.

Please let me know the next direction or action you would like me to take based on the objects and landmarks I've described so far.
go towards island where the tiger is facing it

Understood. I will head towards the island where the tiger is facing on the map.

As I make my way towards that island, please let me know if there are any other objects or landmarks that I should be aware of.
there is map on the island
read the map

Thank you for the information. I have reached the island and I can see the map.

Is there any specific instruction or action you would like me to take in relation to the map?

Apologies, but as the navigator, I am unable to read the map. I am reliant on your instructions and guidance to navigate through the map.

Please provide the next step or direction based on the information you see on the map, and I will proceed accordingly.

chat.msg: Welcome!
on the right, there is a dog next to a picnic blanket
Great! Start by going left (west) from there. Let me know what you see.
there is a deer
Oh, I think you might have gone too far. Let's backtrack a bit. From the white dog and the picnic blanket, go back to the wooden bench. Let me know when you get there.
im next to the bench
Good job! Now, make a u-turn to the left. Let me know when you've made the turn.
there is a flower stand
Almost there! Instead of going to the flower stand, make another left turn and cross the trail. Then, head back towards the white dog. Let me know when you're back near the dog.
there is a couple on a tandem bike
Oops! You've gone a bit off track again. Turn around and head back to the flower stand. Let me know when you get there.
im at the flower stand
Great! Now, let's continue southwards. Cross over the wooden branch and keep going south. What do you see along the way?
a picnic blanket
Excellent! Move towards the picnic blanket and carefully step over it. After that, continue heading west. What do you come across next?
a deer

Hmm, it seems like you might have taken a wrong turn. Let's try again. Go back to the picnic blanket, and this time, make sure to step *on* the picnic blanket. Then continue west. Let me know what you see.
fishes
Oh, I'm sorry, it seems like you've gone off track again. Let's retrace our steps. From the picnic blanket, head back east and cross the wooden branch. Let me know when you've crossed it.
next to the old couple sitting on bench
Great job! Now, move a few steps south, between the old people and another wooden branch. What do you see next?
blue fishes
Oops! It seems like there might be some confusion. From where you are, go back north and then head east, between the wooden branch and the green bush. Let me know when you're there.
next to the old couple

Oh dear, it seems like we've taken a wrong turn again. Let's retrace our steps. Go back north to the wooden branch and then head east, between the branch and the bush. Let me know what you see once you get there.
next to the deer
Perfect! Now, you're on the right track. Keep heading east from the deer. What can you see ahead of you?
a bridge
Great job! Walk towards the bridge, but don't cross it. What can you see just past the bridge?
a flower stand
Oops! It seems like you've taken a wrong turn again. Let's go back a bit. From the bridge, go back west. Let me know when you're back there.
at the bridge
Great! Now, continue going west from the bridge. What do you see just past the bridge?
bush
That's right! Walk past the bush, but make sure to go around it from the right side. Keep going until you reach the flower stand. Let me know when you're there.
at the flower stand
Fantastic! Now, turn left (west) and go below the flower stand. What do you see next?

chat.msg: Welcome!
on the bottom there is a cabin
I see a tent at the top of the map. Can you give me directions from the tent to the cabin?
okay
Great! Please guide me from the tent to the cabin.
go down the tent
I have gone down from the tent. Now what should I do?
past under the dog
then over the fire
I have passed under the dog and gone over the fire. What should be my next move?
go under the red mushrooms and stop in front of the blue car
I have gone under the red mushrooms and now I am in front of the blue car. What should I do next?
go back under the fire towards the telescope
I have gone back under the fire and now I see the blue telescope. What's the next step?
go under the telescope towards a cabin
I have gone under the telescope and now I see the wooden house. Is this the cabin you mentioned earlier?
yes
Great! I have reached the wooden house, which I believe is the cabin. Thank you for your guidance! *finished*

chat.msg: Welcome!
where do you want to start?
Let's start at the top (north-east) part of the map, near a group of three palm trees. Can you see the palm trees?
yes
Great! Stand near the group of three palm trees. Now, I want you to go under the first tree to the south-west. Walk towards that direction. Let me know when you're there.
i'm at the tree
Perfect! Now, take a right turn and walk straight, crossing the second palm tree. Let me know when you've passed it.
i have passed it
Great job! Now, make a sharp left turn right after the third palm tree. You should be facing south now. Keep walking in that direction. Let me know what you see along your way.
there is a brown dog
That's close, but the path actually goes to the left of a brown puppy. Can you navigate to the left of the brown puppy and continue walking south? Let me know what you see further ahead.
two huge rocks on the beach

Almost there! The correct path goes between a big rock on the west and a small rock on the east. Can you find the gap between those rocks and make your way through? Once you pass them, you should reach the ocean. Let me know when you're at the water's edge.
i am at the water's edge
Fantastic! Now, enter the water and face a large red crab. After that, make a sharp right turn (west) and walk along the big rock. Let me know when you've made the turn.
i have made the turn

Great! Now, continue walking west in the water along the big rock. As you move along, you'll pass a third medium-sized rock. Keep going until you see a shark in the water. Let me know when you spot the shark.
i see the shark

Excellent! Now, make a sharp right turn to avoid the shark. Once you've turned, head back to the land. You'll pass between the medium-sized rock and a blue-yellow-white ball. Keep going north after that. Let me know what you see as you continue.
there is a speaker

That's correct! Keep going north, veering slightly left. There should be a red tent on your left and a larger speaker on your right. Continue walking between them. Let me know when you've passed them.
i have passed the tent

Great progress! Now, I want you to circle around the red tent in an arc. After that, continue heading south towards the sea. However, just before you reach the water, take a right turn (west) and go below a red kayak. Let me know when you're below the kayak.
i am at the kayak
Fantastic! Now, turn 90 degrees to the right (north) and start moving along the kayak. Keep going until you reach a small green bush. Let me know when you're at the small green bush.
i am at the small green bush

Congratulations, you have reached the final objective! Well done! You successfully followed the path and arrived at the small green bush. Thank you for playing the game. I hope you enjoyed it! If you'd like to play again or have any other questions, just let me know.
great thank you for the instructions
You're very welcome! It was my pleasure to guide you through the path. If you ever want to play again or need assistance with anything else, don't hesitate to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
you too
Thank you! Take care and have a fantastic day ahead!
what should i do now?

Now that you've reached the small green bush, you can explore the map further, or you can choose to end the game here. It's up to you! If you want to continue exploring, describe what you see, and I can provide further directions. If you're ready to finish, simply let me know.
i am finish

Great job on completing the game! I hope you had a fun and engaging experience. If you ever want to play again or have any other questions or need assistance, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!

general_survey.answer: I think they are just trying to find the words in the other language. It's easier for them to express themselves that way
